description: This course provides a guided summer research opportunity in science for rising sophomores.
The course focuses on a research topic(s) to be determined by the instructor. Students learn
how to ask and evaluate scientific question(s) with emphasis on quantitative approaches; read
from and research the scientific literature; collect and analyze data; and summarize and present
their results in writing and orally. Prerequisite: completion of Summer Bridge program or
fullname: Research Opportunity in Science for Sophomores
